duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain software to support laboratory missions, including code deployment and testing.
Engage and support Mission organizations with AI/ML and Data Analytic solutions, analyzing data to generate results.
Research new technologies and applications for AI/ML, Data, and Analytics, and provide engineering solutions to complex problems.
Apply knowledge of cybersecurity and associated policies, and maintain computer system software, resolving operational problems.
Participate in professional activities, influence project strategies, and provide effective user support and training.
Help build and maintain HPC AI/ML Analytics servers, including after-hours server maintenance and automation scripts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree and 2-5+ years relevant experience | Masters Degree and 1-3+ year relevant experience | PhDDegree must be in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics
